/api/signup.summary: Request creation of new user account

/api/fountains.summary: Primary endpoint for retrieving (GET) and adding (POST) fountains

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description:
Longitude to fetch fountains around.
If provided, must also provide latitude!

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description:
Latitude to fetch fountains around.
If provided, must provide longitude!

200.description: Successful query.  Return array of fountains.

400.description: Malformed request! Missing some information or not in right format.

/api/auth/refresh.summary: For using refresh token to obtain new access token

200.description: Successful refresh request, grant new tokens

400.description: Request is missing required information or is incorrectly formatted

401.description: Credentials incorrect or refresh token expired!

/api/auth.summary: Primary endpoint for password authentication scheme

200.description: Successful auth request, return tokens and token information

400.description: Request is missing required information or is incorrectly formatted

/api/profiles/{username}.summary: Endpoint for getting and updating profiles

403.description: Authorization/authentication failed (access token invalid, or maybe not allowed to view this profile?)

404.description: User with provided username not found!
Could not find user with ID

/api/bathrooms.summary: Primary endpoint for retrieving (GET) and adding (POST) bathrooms

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description:
Longitude to fetch bathrooms around.
If provided, must also provide latitude!

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description:
Latitude to fetch bathrooms around.
If provided, must provide longitude!

200.description: Successful query.  Return array of bathrooms.

400.description: Malformed request! Missing some information or not in right format.

/api/bathrooms/{id}/ratings.summary: Primary endpoint for adding (POST), retrieving (GET), and updating (PUT) bathroom ratings

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Optional pagination: Size of pages to fetch (number of ratings per page)

parameters.name: page_offset
parameters.description: Optional pagination: Offset of page to fetch (default is 0, max is 100)

200.description: Successful query.  Return array of bathroom ratings.

get.summary: Get ratings for a particular bathroom

400.description: Malformed request! Missing some information or not in right format.

get.summary: Get a particular rating for a particular bathroom

/api/bathrooms/{id}.summary: Primary endpoint for retrieving (GET) and updating (PUT) a bathroom.

put.summary: Update bathroom info for a particular bathroom

/api/bathrooms/{id}/pictures.summary: Add, retrieve, and delete bathroom pictures

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of photo to fetch (first picture is 0)

400.description: Malformed request (may be missing required parameters)

404.description: Picture of bathroom with provided offset does not exist!

get.description: Fetches all if no offset provided.  Otherwise fetches just that photo.

post.summary: Add bathroom picture (link only, file hosting will have to be handled separately)

get.summary: Get a particular picture for a particular bathroom

404.description: Picture with provided ID not found!

/api/fountains/{id}/pictures.summary: Add, retrieve, and delete fountain pictures

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of photo to fetch (first picture is 0)

400.description: Malformed request (may be missing required parameters)

404.description: Picture of fountain with provided offset does not exist!

get.description: Fetches all if no offset provided.  Otherwise fetches just that photo.

post.summary: Add fountain picture (link only, file hosting will have to be handled separately)

get.summary: Get a particular picture for a particular fountain

404.description: Picture with provided ID not found!

/api/fountains/{id}/ratings.summary: Primary endpoint for adding (POST), retrieving (GET), and updating (PUT) fountain ratings

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Optional pagination: Size of pages to fetch (number of ratings per page)

parameters.name: page_offset
parameters.description: Optional pagination: Offset of page to fetch (default is 0, max is 100)

200.description: Successful query.  Return array of fountain ratings.

get.summary: Get ratings for a particular fountain

400.description: Malformed request! Missing some information or not in right format.

get.summary: Get a particular rating for a particular fountain

/api/fountains/{id}.summary: Primary endpoint for retrieving (GET) and updating (PUT) a fountain.

put.summary: Update fountain info for a particular fountain

hashed_password.description: Hash of user password for authentication

id.description: Unique user id (not technically necessary but helpful)
Unique id of fountain rating (technically not necessary but nice to have)

fountain_id.description: ID of fountain rating is for

user_id.description: ID of user who created rating

entity_id.description: Fountain or bathroom ID picture is for

bathroom_id.description: ID of bathroom rating is for

user_id.description: ID of user who created bathroom rating

Location.description: Identify a unique location (longitude and latitude)

user_credentials.description: Set of new credentials for new user

bottle_filler.description: Whether or not the fountain features a dedicated bottle filler

sanitary_products.description: Whether or not bathroom has sanitary products available (such as tampons and pads)

baby_changer.description: Whether or not bathroom has a baby changer available

AuthSuccessResponse.description: Tokens and token information returned after successful auth request

refresh_token.description: Token to use to get a new token once access_token expires

expires.description: Number of seconds that access_token is valid for

AuthRefreshRequest.description: Request format for refreshing auth access token

AuthRequest.description: Body of POST request for authentication

Access_Token.description: Obtain access token after sending email and password
Access_Token.name: Authorization
